SEARCH
Package am.aua.npuzzle.core

Class Puzzle15Matrix

java.lang.Object
am.aua.npuzzle.core.Puzzle15Matrix
public class Puzzle15Matrix extends Object
The Puzzle15Matrix class represents the 15-puzzle game by matrix. It provides methods to initialize and play the game.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int
    EMPTY
    The value representing the empty tile is 0.
    static final int
    SIZE
    The size of the puzzle is 4x4.

  • Constructor Details

    • Puzzle15Matrix

      public Puzzle15Matrix(String input)
      Constructor of Puzzle15Matrix from an input string. The input must be in the form: "15 2 1 12 : 8 5 6 11 : 4 9 10 7 : 3 14 13 0".
      Parameters:
      input - The string representing the initial state of the puzzle.

    • Puzzle15Matrix

      public Puzzle15Matrix(Puzzle15Matrix puzzle)
      Creates a copy of an existing Puzzle15Matrix.
      Parameters:
      puzzle - The puzzle instance to copy.

  • Method Details

    • getEmptyCol

      public int getEmptyCol()
      Getter for the column index of the empty tile.
      Returns:
      The column index of the empty tile.

    • getEmptyRow

      public int getEmptyRow()
      Getter for the row index of the empty tile.
      Returns:
      The row index of the empty tile.

    • getTile

      public int getTile(int row, int col)
      Getter for the tile value at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      row - The row of element.
      col - The column of element.
      Returns:
      The tile value at the specified position.

    • setTiles

      public void setTiles(int row, int col, int value)
      Setter for a tile value at the specified position if the value is valid and unique.
      Parameters:
      row - The row index.
      col - The column index.
      value - The tile value (must be between 0 and 15).

    • play

      public void play()
      Starts the game, allowing the user to enter movement commands.
